DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to Prove that injection of 15 to 20 mL of lidocaine 1% into the fracture site (Hematoma block) is more effective in terms of pain relieving then injection of 10 mL of lidocaine 2%, and equally safe in terms of complications, for closed reduction of distal radius fractures.
DOC.brief_title: Hematoma Block for Reduction of Distal Radius Fractures
DOC.criteria: Patients with Fractures of the distal radius, with or without ulna fracture Children, pregnant women, patients with infection or suspected infection on the site for injection.
